description.p: This event fires after the user presses the Submit button to update the database. If the user submits multiple edited rows at once, this event is fired after all updates have been performed.

discussion.p: This event is included for backwards compatibility with Alpha Five v9. The [AfterUpdateRecord], [AfterDeleteRecord], and [AfterInsertRecord] events are preferred.

section.note: This event does *[NOT]* fire if the user submits an individual row.

section.description: The following variables are available to you in the event:

item.name: Args
item.description: Contains the submitted data, GridDefinition, and rtc object.
